#summary OSX Installation Notes

= Introduction =

Installation notes for OSX Leopard (10.5)


= Method =

1) enable Web Sharing (System Preferences > Sharing > Web Sharing)


2) Create file `/etc/apache2/users/USERNAME.conf`

{{{
<Directory "/Users/USERNAME/Sites/">
    Options Indexes FollowSymlinks MultiViews
    AllowOverride All
    Order allow,deny
    Allow from all
</Directory>

<Directory "/Users/USERNAME/Sites/cgi-bin/">
    Options ExecCGI FollowSymLinks
    SetHandler cgi-script
</Directory>

AccessFileName .htaccess
}}}


3) Create file `/Users/USERNAME/Sites/.htaccess`

{{{
RewriteEngine  On
RewriteBase    /~USERNAME
RewriteRule    ^mine(.*)      cgi-bin/protomine.cgi$1
}}}
